text: Wildwood is a upcoming stop-motion animated dark fantasy and sixth movie produced by Laika planned to be released in 2026. It is directed by Travis Knight and written by Chris Butler, based on Colin Meloy's 2011 book illustrated by Carson Ellis. An voice cast of Peyton Elizabeth Lee, Jacob Tremblay, Carey Mulligan, Mahershala Ali, Awkwafina, Angela Bassett, Jake Johnson, Charlie Day, Amandla Stenberg, Jemaine Clement, Maya Erskine, Tantoo Cardinal, Tom Waits, and Richard E. Grant as the voices. title: Wildwood (movie)
